phrases.lang_success: Language is successfully switched to English
phrases.guess_start: I guessed a number between 1 and {0}. Guess it in {1} seconds and {2} tries.
phrases.guess_fail_time: You ran out of time. My number was {0}.
phrases.guess_fail_tries: You ran out of tries. My number was {0}.
phrases.guess_win: You won. My number was indeed {0}.
phrases.prefix_success: Successfully changed my prefix to {0} on this guild.
phrases.prefix_fail: Failed to set the prefix! Maybe your prefix is longer than 32 characters?
phrases.info: Rowan Bot assembly {0}:{1}. Amount of executed commands on this server: {2}.
phrases.info_fail: Rowan Bot assembly {0}:{1}. Failed to load per-server info.
phrases.configure_fail_int: Your value is not and integer or exceeds provided limit. See <prefix>help command to see allowed values.
phrases.configure_fail_format: Your value is using an unknown format mention or exceeds allowed length.
phrases.configure_fail_other: Your value is incorrect type or exceeds a certain limit. See <prefix>help command to see allowed values.
phrases.error_db: An unexpected database error happened. Perhaps your server is not registered.
phrases.caps: You caps filter is set to {0}%.
phrases.error_permissions_mine: I don't have needed permission(s) to do that.
phrases.error_permissions_your: You don't have enough rights to do that.

help.all:
List of all Rowan commands:
- help - shows this message
Admin commands:
- prefix - updates the prefix
- language - sets the language
- configure - configures the preferences
Mod commands:
- kick - kicks a user
- ban - bans a user
- mute - timeouts a user
- unmute - unmutes a user
- purge - clears a part of chat
General commands:
- blable - copies what you say
- zen - quotes ''The Zen of Python''
- coin - flips a coin
- dice - rolls a dice
- poll - creates a poll
- math - starts a math game
- guess - starts a number guesser
- eval - solves a math problem or equation
Use help <a> where a is command to know more about it. *p is optional.
help.help: Help - shows list of all commands. Help <a> - description of command <a>.
help.prefix:
Prefix

- sets your guilds prefix to p. Use quotation marks to make prefix with spacing.
help.language: Language <l> - sets language to l. Available languages: Russian (ru), English (en).
help.blable: Blable - copies what you write after it.
help.zen: Zen - prints out the ''Zen of Python''.
help.purge: Purge <n> - deletes n messages from bottom. You require rights to manage messages!
help.dice: Dice <*s> - rolls a dice with s sides. If you don't provide any, rolls 6.
help.info: Info - shows bot version and the amount of executed commands on Your guild.
help.eval:
Eval

- evaluates p problem. Allows equations. Use ^ or ** for getting value1 to the power of value 2. Write x with coeffitients separating them with *.
help.guess: Guess - starts a number guesser game.
help.math: Math - starts an alithmetic problem solver game.
help.configure: Configure <c> <v1> <*v2> - configures c setting (or v1 subsetting of c setting) with v2. Read detailed info about each setting on the wiki: https://hub.mos.ru/videv/Rowan/-/wikis/%D0%9A%D0%B0%D0%BA-%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%84%D0%B8%D0%B3%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C-%D0%B1%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B0
help.kick:
Kick

<*r> - kicks p person with r reason.
help.ban:
Ban

<*r> - bans p person with r reason.
help.mute:
Mute

<*r> <*d> <*h> <*m> - timeouts p person with r reason for d days, h hours and m minutes. Mutes for 5 mins if no arguments provided.
help.unmute:
Unmute

- unmutes p person. (Sends a message even if person is not timeouted)
help.register: Registers your guild in Rowan database for allowing configuration. Since 0.7 this command is mostly for debugging purposes.
help.poll: Poll <*a> - Adds a ''poll'' using keycap emojis with numbers up to a. Max 10 min 2. If none is provided, makes it a yes/no poll.
help.foo: Debug command for language and prefix testing. Why do you know it's there?

zen:
The Zen of Python, by Tim Peters

Beautiful is better than ugly.
Explicit is better than implicit.
Simple is better than complex.
Complex is better than complicated.
Flat is better than nested.
Sparse is better than dense.
Readability counts.
Special cases aren't special enough to break the rules.
Although practicality beats purity.
Errors should never pass silently.
Unless explicitly silenced.
In the face of ambiguity, refuse the temptation to guess.
There should be one-- and preferably only one --obvious way to do it.
Although that way may not be obvious at first unless you're Dutch.
Now is better than never.
Although never is often better than *right* now.
If the implementation is hard to explain, it's a bad idea.
If the implementation is easy to explain, it may be a good idea.
Namespaces are one honking great idea -- let's do more of those!
